name: Ziruza
description: '''Ziruza Tasmagambetova''' ({{langx|kk|Зируза Сапарғалиқызы Тасмағамбетова}}, ''Ziruza Saparğaliqyzy Tasmağambetova''; born 10 January 1997),  known professionally as '''Ziruza''', is a [[Q-pop]] singer, songwriter and actress. The first video clip was  released in 2017 for the song "Айт ендi".
